Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience tailored to elevate your daily life. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering its immense value and benefits, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $125. This is an opportunity to own a piece that combines functionality, style, and durability, all at a price that represents its true worth. I trust you'll appreciate its value as much as we do. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
